statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, location FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name FROM customers WHERE location ST_Distance('POINT(-122.33 47.61)'::geography) < 10000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM customers WHERE id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, name, ST_X(location) AS latitude, ST_Y(location) AS longitude FROM customers WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stores WHERE store_name LIKE '%Mart%';

SELECT * FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, location FROM stores WHERE store_id = 5;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM stores WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, COUNT(*) FROM spatial_queries GROUP BY store_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT store_id FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT total_amount, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM spatial_queries WHERE store_id = 2 AND radius >= 10;
SELECT store_id, location FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 100;
SELECT * FROM store_locations INNER JOIN spatial_queries ON store_locations.store_id = spatial_queries.store_id WHERE radius > 5;
SELECT COUNT(store_id) AS store_count, AVG(ST_X(location)) AS avg_x_coordinate FROM store_locations;

SELECT name, category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC, name DESC;
SELECT store_id, product_id, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE store_id = 1;

SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT store_id, product_id, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
